main: ^I don't think i've ever smelt something so nightmarish before.
Hello: ^Such a smell should be kept away from someone like me
^I'll need a whole new perfume to get rid of this Nightmare smell
^I bet something from the Grotto would have a unique smell
^Maybe if I could find a new perfume recipe in the Grotto that smell would leave me alone
HearMe: ^Ah yes a perfume from the Grotto is just what I need
^I'll go find some later, my flowers need some care first
BadSmell: ^Such a fowl oder should leave me alone until it has a better smell for me
